import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' export default function Hamilton() { const [seq1, setSeq1] = useState([{}]) const [seq2, setSeq2] = useState([{}]) const [hdresult, setHdresult] = useState('') const getHamiltonDistance = () => { setHdresult('') axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/dna/utils/hamilton_distance/', { 'seq1': seq1,'seq2': seq2 }) .then(res => setHdresult(res.data)) }; return

Hamilton Distance
